meanings.definition: A series of fibers connecting the ciliary body of the eye with the lens.
meanings.sent1: The zonules help hold the lens in place in the eye.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmologist explained how important the zonules are for eye health.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous zonules decided to play tug-of-war with the lens.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the zonules that keep the lens steady.
meanings.sent5: Like tiny ropes, the zonules carefully support the lens, ensuring clear vision.
